an5.52:1.1: “Akusalarasiti, bhikkhave, vadamano panca nivarane samma vadamano vadeyya.
an5.52:1.2: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, akusalarasi yadidam panca nivarana.
an5.52:1.5: Akusalarasiti, bhikkhave, vadamano ime panca nivarane samma vadamano vadeyya.
an5.52:1.6: Kevalo hayam, bhikkhave, akusalarasi yadidam panca nivarana”ti.
